fullDescription: Ana Luisa makes Earth-friendly jewelry that's designed to last, improving everyday life for people around the world. They create high-quality, sustainable jewelry that's affordable, ensuring each piece endures the test of time. Their designs remain classic, their quality unmatched, and their commitment to the environment steadfast.

layout.title: Time for a change
text: When Francesca's came to us, their brand was stale. Their 11-15 year old female customers had grown more sophisticated than when the company was first founded in 2006. Girls now preferred hipper brands like Madewell and Asos.
But at the same time, the company didn't want to alienate the parents of these young women. We came up with a brand direction which tested very well with everyone. It was hipper, but not too hip.

points.description: Visitors new to the brand might get confused by the different watches in this navigation. Instead, consider grouping them all under one 'Shop' tab in the navigation. This will let them see all options side by side.

These reviews are great but they're hidden in a carousel, where many people might miss them. Research indicates that carousels often see limited interaction, with the majority of users only noticing the first slide. Considering putting the reviews on the product pages where more people will see them.
